What is (are) Microcephalic osteodysplastic primordial dwarfism type 1 ?,"Microcephalic osteodysplastic primordial dwarfism type 1 (MOPD1) is a genetic condition that is mainly characterized by intrauterine and post-natal growth retardation; an abnormally small head size (microcephaly);
